short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cerberus companion extension for web browser testing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cerberus extension is a companion app for testers using Cerberus Testing platform. This extension aims to provide various tools for testers to help them complete specific Cerberus use cases.
